story.heading: Helping You Find Your Place in the World
story.body1: Founded in 2020, PropertySale began with a simple mission, to remove the hassle and uncertainty from the Sri Lankan real estate market. We noticed that buyers struggled with unclear paperwork and hidden prices.
story.body2: Today, we combine modern technology with deep local market knowledge to provide a seamless experience for buyers, sellers, and investors alike.
